mapper.select: SELECT t.theaterName, t.theaterIdx FROM favoritetheater f JOIN theater t ON f.theaterIdx = t.theaterIdx WHERE f.userIdx = #{userIdx}

SELECT screenType, dayOfWeek, timeOfDay, MAX(CASE WHEN ageGroup = 1 THEN seatPrice END) AS generalPrice, MAX(CASE WHEN ageGroup = 2 THEN seatPrice END) AS teenPrice FROM price GROUP BY screenType, dayOfWeek, timeOfDay
SELECT t.theaterRegion AS region, COUNT(*) AS count FROM theater t WHERE t.theaterStatus = 0 GROUP BY t.theaterRegion

SELECT t.theaterName, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardIdx FROM board b LEFT JOIN theater t ON b.theaterIdx = t.theaterIdx WHERE b.boardType = 'EVENT' AND b.boardStatus = 0 AND b.theaterIdx is not NULL ORDER BY b.boardRegDate DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT t.theaterName, t.theaterRegion, b.boardIdx, b.boardTitle, DATE(b.boardRegDate) as boardRegDate FROM board b LEFT JOIN theater t ON b.theaterIdx = t.theaterIdx WHERE b.boardType = 'NOTICE' AND b.boardStatus = 0 AND b.theaterIdx is not NULL ORDER BY b.boardRegDate DESC LIMIT 5
